article_title: Dansville man accused of stealing purse at bar
article_text:
March 29, 2016 08:00 AM

Police in Dansville arrested a man who they say stole a purse from a local bar.

On Saturday night around 9, police responded to a report of a stolen purse at a bar the night before. Police did not say what bar the purse was stolen from. After an investigation, police say they located the suspect, 26-year-old Andrew Campbell of Dansville.
